- fixed: comments in Profiles
- enjoy your NumBuster at new speed!
- improved CallerID - receive new updates for your offline SPAMbase more often (Call blocking & Identification should be activated in your Settings)
- now you can block calls from unwanted callers - just tap Block in their Profile and save your time and money with free NumBuster Blacklist option
- now you can block all unwanted SMS - just add sender's number or unwanted text templates in NumBuster (Unknown & Spam -> SMS Filtering should be enabled in your Settings)
- some design improvemets applied

One is cured - the other is crippled =)
We apologize to several thousand NumBuster Users for broken reviews and disabling activations in the application.
REPAIRED!
Will not happen again!

- Caller ID for incoming calls. Local database of scammers and SPAM numbers for free
- Block calls from numbers by your choice
- SMS block by numbers and contained text

1) Updated built-in library of scammers and SPAMERS on the smartphone.
Remember about the system limitation: during an incoming call - information is taken only from this limited offline library (contains information of only 1.9 million phone numbers).
If the telephone number calling you is in this library, you will receive information about this telephone number on the call screen.

2) You can check any phone numbers through the "share contact" in the call log of your smartphone and through the search bar in the application.
In this case, you will receive information about the number from the NumBuster online servers (information about more than 1.5 billion phone numbers) without restrictions.


3) Now you can hide reviews in the Phone Number Profile for a while if you personally do not like them. To do this, use the internal currency - NumCy.

4) You can get NumCy for free every day, thanks to the daily game. You can also buy NumCy in the app.
5) You can turn Push messages about events in the Profile of your number on and off.
6) Call and SMS blocking has been substantially reworked, bugs have been fixed.
7) You can send complaints to names in Details and reviews - Moderators will check them for violations of the System Rules.
8) We improved the design of the application, updated the instructions
9) We have accelerated the application

Immediate plans:
- it will be possible to purchase some of the application features, improve the profile of your number and much more, using NumCy.
- we are preparing new improvements for the Trust Rating in telephone numbers' Profiles

Hello! In this update :
- blocking of incoming calls and SMS of your choice. - was improved!
- if NumBuster is on the 1st place among the identifier applications in your smartphone, then it works with an incoming call more often and warns about 1,900,000 dangerous phone numbers when you call. Don't forget to update this library of dangerous numbers right in the app!
- checking unknown phone numbers is even faster now - we have added some new powers to our servers all over the World!
- small changes in design - we try to follow your wishes.
- *THIS TIME - AVAILABLE ONLY TO NumBuster PRO Users : lets find out your character traits by a photo, using NeuroOwl in the Profile of your number - this is really fun and useful =)
Our neural network works with your face photos basing on huge statistical data - and it makes great strides already!
Check it out!

(!) We are starting extensive testing of the new NumBuster patented function "Mutual mates" (beta) in number Profiles:
- at this first stage, you may choose the phone number you know in your contacts (any of your friend who also use NumBuster), enter his Profile and send him a request to show your mutual mates.
- tell us if you have something interesting with this new feature! Are there any problems? We are waiting for your opinions on our social networks and at support@numbuster.com
- in the next update we will expand the capabilities (second stage) of the "Mutual mates" function.

- We are improving the stability and speed of the application, as we respond to your wishes;
- We've fixed the bugs, which you are helping us to identify, thanks!
